summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PluralSkill LMS v2 with enhanced features. Backend APIs working well (85.7% success rate), frontend UI functioning correctly with all 4 main sections, but found one critical frontend issue affecting admin dashboard.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for course creation
Returns 200 instead of 201 for workshop creation
Returns 200 instead of 201 for lab creation

timeout_issues.issue: AI path generation takes longer than 10 seconds
timeout_issues.impact: User experience - generation works but needs patience
timeout_issues.note: AI generation is working (existing paths found), just needs longer timeout

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: 'GraduationCap is not defined' preventing admin dashboard from rendering
ui_bugs.impact: Admin dashboard completely broken - shows only error screen

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all 4 sections: Workshops first, Open Source, Courses, Labs
Workshop cards display industry leaders with company logos (Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, Amazon, Toyota, Stripe)
Found 5 industry speakers: Sarah Chen, Michael Torres, Jennifer Williams, David Kim, Yuki Tanaka
Found 6 company logos from logo.clearbit.com
Navigation includes Courses, Labs, Open Source links - all working
/labs page loads correctly with lab cards
/labs/:slug detail page shows step-by-step guided instructions with prerequisites and skills
/open-source page loads with AI path generation dialog
AI path generation dialog opens with skill input and industry selection
Existing AI-generated learning paths display correctly with detailed 8-week roadmaps
Course catalog shows 6 industry-focused courses (Finance, HR, Retail, Operations, AI Tools, Power BI)
Course categories clearly labeled: Finance, Human Resources, Retail, Operations, Technology, Business Intelligence
User signup and login flow working correctly
Backend API health endpoints working (85.7% success rate)
User authentication and session management working
Course CRUD operations for admin working (backend)
Workshop management with speaker structure working (backend)
Labs CRUD operations working (backend)
Open source learning path generation working (backend - existing paths found)
Authentication security working (401 for protected endpoints, 403 for admin-only)
All seeded data present: 3 workshops, 6 courses, 4 labs, 1 AI-generated path
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical JavaScript error in AdminDashboard component: 'GraduationCap is not defined'. This is preventing the admin dashboard from rendering. Likely missing import for GraduationCap icon from lucide-react.
